Viewing the eclipse with a pinhole camera



Taken Monday, June 10, 2002, 06:31:47pm.  Original image size: 2528x1896, 6.8Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/80s @ F5.6, ISO 100, 70-200mm/F2.8 @ 70mm (112mm equiv)
PS6 Colin 3.0 Medium L 0:0 - 10:10 - 30:40 - 40:50 - 90:85 - 100:100, Crop, USM L 150:0.5, Levels L 5:1.2:255, G 0:1.05:255
